lib/contract.js
"use strict"; module.exports = class Contract { constructor(classDefinition) { if( !classDefinition.bytecode ) { throw new Error("Test class definition has no bytecode"); } if( !classDefinition.interface ) { throw new Error("Test class definition has no interface"); } this.abi = classDefinition.interface; if( typeof(this.abi) === "string" ) { this.abi = JSON.parse(this.abi); } this.bytecode = classDefinition.bytecode; } };
